title: Mon Post Show (10-31-22)
itunes:title: Mon Post Show (10-31-22)
description:
Bobby had a crazy headache yesterday from traveling. A group of people were busted for gambling in the NBA 2k league.  A 70 year old woman won 300k after winning 100k in a previous lottery. A 12-year old was found in Canada after missing 2 months from Florida. Luke Bryan released a statement after bringing Governor Desantis to Florida. Paul Pelosi who was attacked with a hammer at his home.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
